Name: Trick-Or-Treat
Effect: Single Target. Add the Ghost Type to the Target's Type(s). (eg. Pikachu will now be 'Electric/Ghost', and Charizard will now be 'Fire/Flying/Ghost'). If the Target already has a third Type, replace it.
Description: The Pok√©mon takes the target trick-or-treating. The target gets a ghost costume which somehow cannot be removed without a medium's help.
